resources.string:
To measure hrv follow the below steps:- 

 	Step 1 :- Go to Analyze tab 

 	Step 2 :- Cover the camera and flashlight completely using only the tip of your index finger such that the preview shown becomes completely dark. 

 	Step 3 :- Click on start and wait while the app collects the sample. When the sample collection is complete you will be asked to hold on for a few seconds for necessary calculations to be done. 

 	Step 4 :- Results will be shown on the screen if successful. 



 To Save result follow the below steps 

 	Step 5 :- Enter username (optional) and click on save button 

 	Step 6 :- The saved data will be visible in the “Saved” tab. 

 The saved text file for all measurements can be found at location 
 Android>media>com.camo.Ip_Project 

 The file naming format is hrv_(unixtimestamp)_(username).txt

The app requires the following permissions to work 

 	1) Camera:- For collecting sample 

 	2) Storage:- For saving the results 



 You will be asked for these permissions now, please allow them to proceed further.
